entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of flurries this evening and then to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
